verses.verse: Brothers, <S%G80><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%>'s desire <S%G2107><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> my prayer <S%G1162><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> Israel, <S%G2474><s%> that <S%G1519><s%> they may be saved. <S%G4991><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I testify <S%G3140><s%> about <S%G3140><s%> them <S%G846><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they have <S%G2192><s%> a zeal <S%G2205><s%> for God, <S%G2316><s%> but <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> knowledge. <S%G1922><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> being ignorant of <S%G50><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> to establish <S%G2476><s%> their own <S%G2398><s%> righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> they <S%G5293><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> subject themselves <S%G5293><s%> to the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is the fulfillment <S%G5056><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> to everyone <S%G3956><s%> who believes. <S%G4100><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> writes <S%G1125><s%> about the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> <S%G3754><s%> "The one <S%G444><s%> who <S%G3754><s%> does <S%G4160><s%> them <S%G846><s%> will live <S%G2198><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> which is of <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> this, <S%G3779><s%> "Don't <S%G3361><s%> say <S%G2036><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> heart, <S%G2588><s%> <S%G5101><s%> 'Who will ascend <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven? <S%G3772><s%>' (that <S%G5124><s%> is, <S%G2076><s%> to bring <S%G2609><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> down <S%G2609><s%>);

or, <S%G2228><s%> <S%G5101><s%> 'Who will descend <S%G2597><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the abyss? <S%G12><s%>' (that <S%G5124><s%> is, <S%G2076><s%> to bring Christ <S%G5547><s%> up <S%G321><s%> <S%G321><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead. <S%G3498><s%>)"

But <S%G235><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> does it <S%G3004><s%> say? <S%G4487><s%> "The word is <S%G2076><s%> near <S%G1451><s%> you, <S%G4675><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> mouth, <S%G4750><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> heart; <S%G2588><s%>" that <S%G5124><s%> is, <S%G2076><s%> the word <S%G4487><s%> of faith, <S%G4102><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we preach: <S%G2784><s%>

that <S%G3754><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you will confess <S%G3670><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> raised <S%G1453><s%> him <S%G846><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%> you will be saved. <S%G4982><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> with the heart, <S%G2588><s%> one believes <S%G4100><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> righteousness; <S%G1343><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> with the mouth <S%G4750><s%> confession is made <S%G3670><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> salvation. <S%G4991><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the Scripture <S%G1124><s%> says, <S%G3004><s%> "Whoever <S%G3956><s%> believes <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%> will <S%G2617><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be disappointed. <S%G2617><s%>"

For <S%G1063><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> distinction <S%G1293><s%> between <S%G5037><s%> Jew <S%G2453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Greek; <S%G1672><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G2962><s%> same <S%G846><s%> Lord is Lord <S%G2962><s%> of all, <S%G3956><s%> and is rich <S%G4147><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> who call on <S%G1941><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
For, <S%G1063><s%> <S%G302><s%> "Whoever <S%G3956><s%> will call on <S%G1941><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> will be saved. <S%G4982><s%>"

How <S%G4459><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> will they call on him <S%G1941><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> they have <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> believed? <S%G4100><s%> <S%G1161><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> will they believe <S%G4100><s%> in him whom <S%G3739><s%> they have <S%G191><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> heard? <S%G191><s%> <S%G1161><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> will they hear <S%G191><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> a preacher? <S%G2784><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> will they preach <S%G1437><s%> unless <S%G3361><s%> they are sent? <S%G649><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> it is written: <S%G1125><s%> "How <S%G5613><s%> beautiful <S%G5611><s%> are the feet <S%G4228><s%> of those who preach the Good News <S%G2097><s%> of peace, <S%G1515><s%> who bring glad tidings <S%G2097><s%> of good things! <S%G18><s%>"

But <S%G235><s%> they <S%G5219><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> listen <S%G5219><s%> to the glad news. <S%G2098><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> says, <S%G3004><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> has believed <S%G4100><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> report? <S%G189><s%>"
So <S%G686><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> comes by <S%G1537><s%> hearing, <S%G189><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> hearing <S%G189><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the word <S%G4487><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> I say, <S%G3361><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> they <S%G191><s%> hear? <S%G191><s%> Yes, <S%G3304><s%> most certainly, "Their <S%G846><s%> sound <S%G5353><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out into <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the ends <S%G4009><s%> of the world. <S%G3625><s%>"

But <S%G235><s%> I ask, <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1097><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%> know? <S%G1097><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> says, <S%G3361><s%> "I <S%G1473><s%> will provoke <S%G3863><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> to jealousy <S%G3863><s%> with <S%G1909><s%> that which is no <S%G3756><s%> nation, <S%G1484><s%> with <S%G1909><s%> a nation <S%G1484><s%> void of understanding <S%G801><s%> I will make you <S%G5209><s%> angry. <S%G3949><s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> is very bold, <S%G662><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> says, <S%G3004><s%> "I was found <S%G2147><s%> by those <S%G3588><s%> who didn't <S%G3361><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> me. <S%G1691><s%> I was <S%G1096><s%> revealed <S%G1717><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who didn't <S%G3361><s%> ask <S%G1905><s%> for <S%G1905><s%> me. <S%G1691><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> as to <S%G4314><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%> he says, <S%G3004><s%> "All <S%G3650><s%> day long <S%G2250><s%> I stretched out <S%G1600><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> a disobedient <S%G544><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> contrary <S%G483><s%> people. <S%G2992><s%>"
